parsed.recap:
DEV: Rance's latent mage-gift exploded during bandit attack; obliterated Lisle village; Companion Senta arrived and Chose him; discovered red robes hidden under bandit clothing; Rance stabilized from Gift-shock; traveled to Haven; arrived at Collegium; Rance/Talia full mind-merge during memory recovery; Rance now possesses all Talia's knowledge/training; Mage-Gift confirmed—first since Vanyel; evidence confirms Karsite Sun-Priests using blood magic/taking live captives from Lisle; Circle briefed under secrecy; Rance quartered at Healer's cottage in Companion's Field; Talia visited Rance before dawn with decision about shared memory situation.

PEND: Talia's proposal to Selenay/Circle about memory situation; diplomatic inquiries to neighboring kingdoms about Karsite activity; Mage-Gift training with no living teachers; political implications of two people with Queen's Own knowledge; Karsite blood magic threat; Alberich's training approach; Talia's meeting with Selenay.
